import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './SinglePost.css'; import { TiWorld } from 'react-icons/ti'; import { FaRegCommentAlt, FaRegWindowClose, FaUserLock, FaUserAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; import { AiOutlineLike } from 'react-icons/ai'; import { IoIosShareAlt } from "react-icons/io"; import CommentEditor from './CommentEditor.jsx'; import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; function SinglePost() { const currentUser = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ustk')).info; const {idPost} = useParams(); useEffect(() => { getPost() },[]) const getPost = async () => { await axios.post("https://www.api.mohi.vn/api/auth/detail-post/" + idPost) .then((res) => { console.log(res); }) } return (
{currentUser.user_first_name + " " + currentUser.user_last_name}
